channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Desktop BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Desktop BIOS

item.title: CVE-2023-43577|2023-11-08T22:38:22.292Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the ReFlash module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43576|2023-11-08T22:37:43.945Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the WMISwSmi module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43567|2023-11-08T22:04:47.676Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the LemSecureBootForceKey module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43571|2023-11-08T22:18:31.018Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the BiosExtensionLoader module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43570|2023-11-08T22:07:32.645Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the SMI callback function of the OemSmi driver that may allow a local attacker with elevated permissions to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43573|2023-11-08T22:34:34.124Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios

item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the OemSmi module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.Â

item.title: CVE-2023-43568|2023-11-08T22:05:53.826Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer over-read was reported in the LemSecureBootForceKey module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to disclose sensitive information.

item.description: A buffer over-read was reported in the BiosExtensionLoader module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to disclose sensitive information.

item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the SmuV11Dxe driver in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the SmuV11DxeVMR module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the UltraFunctionTable module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43574|2023-11-08T22:35:35.999Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description:
A buffer over-read was reported in the LEMALLDriversConnectedEventHook module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges
to disclose sensitive information.
